statements: UPDATE biometric_authentication SET authentication_status = TRUE WHERE biometric_id = 1;
UPDATE biometric_authentication SET biometric_data = '{"fingerprints": [{"thumb": true, "index": true}]}' WHERE biometric_id = 2;
UPDATE biometric_authentication SET authentication_status = true WHERE biometric_id = 100
UPDATE biometric_authentication SET biometric_data = '{"fingerprint": "ABC123"}', authentication_status = false WHERE biometric_id = 200
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_feature = 'Fingerprint scanning' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET success = true WHERE user_id = 5 AND authenticated_at < '2021-10-01';
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_feature = 'Fingerprint Scan' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET success = TRUE, authenticated_at = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE user_credentials SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET authentication_result = true, match_score = 0.9 WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_data = 'updated data', timestamp = NOW(), user_id = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET biometric_type = 'fingerprint', match_score = 0.95, authentication_result = true WHERE user_id = 200 AND device_id = 1;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_type='Fingerprint' WHERE biometric_id=1;
UPDATE user_data SET username='john_doe' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE biometric_data SET biometric_type = 'Fingerprint', biometric_data = COMPRESS('fingerprint_data_here') WHERE biometric_id = 1;
UPDATE user_data SET username = 'john_doe', user_bio_id = 2 WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE users SET full_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 'c6b0d8c7-389f-4bcf-9bb7-4d28a4e1c027';
UPDATE biometric_data SET timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 'c6b0d8c7-389f-4bcf-9bb7-4d28a4e1c027';
UPDATE users SET full_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE real_time_inputs SET fingerprint_input = E'\xDEADBEEF'::bytea, face_input = E'\xABCD1234'::bytea WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
